name: Armin
description: Unmatched in her bravery, commander of the Longtail Company
story: A particularly ticklish feline Suin, Armin is the valiant and cheerful Commander of the Longtail Company. However, she is easily tempted, and quickly convinced to go along with the whims of her fellow mercenaries. She loves to collect earrings but since her ears are so sensitive she's unable to actually wear them.
get_line: Oh, did you need something? Just let me know!

relations.description: A mercenary of the Longtail Company. Armin feels sorry to see Kluri work so hard for such a poor mercenary company.
A Homunculus placed under Armin's care by Cidd. She can be frustrating, but has also been of great help to the Longtail Company.
Belonging to different mercenary companies, they frequently bump into each other in the course of their work, leading to a growing rivalry.
As they continued to work together on various requests in and around Savara, they developed a deep trust toward one another.
A frequent customer of the Longtail Company.

specialty.name: Agile Mercenaries
specialty.description: Handles requests with diligence and efficiency.

skills.name: Takedown
skills.description: Attacks with a large shield, with a {{variable}} chance of stunning for 1 turn. When the enemy is debuffed, the chance will increase. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Shield Wall
skills.description: Covers all allies with the Shield of Light and grants a barrier for 3 turns before recovering Health. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Defense, and amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. Decreases damage suffered by allies by 10% when this skill is unavailable. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
skills.soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

buffs.name: Barrier
buffs.effect: Neutralizes some of the damage taken when attacked.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

debuffs.name: Poison
debuffs.effect: Receives damage equivalent to 5% of max Health at the start of the turn.

ex_equip.name: Golden Cat's Treasure
ex_equip.description: An ear-protecting ornament that was passed down in Armin's family and brings wealth and honor.

skills.description: Takedown's chance of stunning is increased by 25%.
Shield Wall's barrier strength is increased by 50%.
Dispels one debuff from all allies when using Shield Wall.
skills.skill_description: Covers all allies with the Shield of Light and grants a barrier for 3 turns, recovering Health and dispelling one debuff. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense, and amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health. Decreases damage suffered by allies by 10% when this skill is unavailable.

skill1.name: シールドバッシュ
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、25.0%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与する。対象が弱体状態の場合、効果発生率がUPする。自身の防御力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: ライトフラッシュ
skill2.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、85.0%の確率で命中率DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: シールドブロック
skill3.desc: 味方全体にシールドを3ターンの間付与し、生命力を回復する。自身の防御力が高いほどシールド効果がUPし、対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。このスキルが使用不可能な状態の時、味方が受けるダメージが10％DOWNする。ダメージDOWN効果が重複した場合、一番高い効果のみ適用される。
skill3.soul_description: 味方全体にシールドを3ターンの間付与し、生命力を回復する。自身の防御力が高いほどシールド効果がUPし、対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。このスキルが使用不可能な状態の時、味方が受けるダメージが10％DOWNする。ダメージDOWN効果が重複した場合、一番高い効果のみ適用される。
